body.name: Car Camera Dash Cam Front with Card Reader Rechargeable Dashboard Camera,170° Wide Angle,Built in IR Night Vision,G-Sensor (X2)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 17 mins
features: 【Multi-function Dashcam】 The dash cams for cars features f1.8 aperture, 170° wide-angle lens, WDR, G-sensor, parking monitoring, motion detection, loop recording, emergency video locking and more to provide you with a safe driving experience and help you see every detail as clearly as possible when playing back.

【Card Reader 】This car dashboard camera comes with a card reader in the package, so there is no need to purchase an additional card reader card. Simply insert the Micro-SD card into the card slot and this dashboard will automatically record when the car engine starts. With the included card reader, you can insert the micro SD card directly into the card reader and plug the card reader into your computer to get the recorded video.

【Easy Install and Used】: This automatic camera is easy to install and use, even if it's your first time using it, there's no need to worry. The suction cup holder is easy to firmly adhere to the glass, and if a few drops of water are applied to the glass, the suction cup will be more secure. The dash cam will start recording immediately after ignition and save the video when you turn off the engine.

【Built in G-sensor】With built-in G-sensor, dashboard camera can automatically detect a sudden shake/collision and lock the footage to prevent the video from being overwritten . Accident scene can be truly restored. Your safety and lagal rignts are alway under protection.

【 Accessories/Services 】 The packaging includes: dash cam * 1, card reader * 1, car charger * 1, manual * 1. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our customer service team, and we will reply to you within 24 hours.
body.description: Dash Cam is the advanced 1080P onboard camera Front with super night vision, loop recording and G-Sensor sensor.【Car dash cam product features】1080P car dash cam that makes important details such as traffic signs and vehicle license plates easy to read in all weather conditions.The auto camera dash simultaneously capture 170° of the road in crystal-clear detail to ensure that every angle is captured and nothing is missed.Equipped with a large lens with F1.8 aperture and superior HDR, it automatically adjusts dashboard exposure to deliver razor-sharp images even at night.The cameras have variable-sensitivity G-sensor: automatically detects collisions and locks the video in an emergency file to prevent it from being overwritten.This dash cam with front and rear cameras allows you to record details in more detail while driving, and helps you park in reverse more safely.This rechargeable dash camera parking mode is powered by the dashboard's internal battery. The camera's internal battery lasts approximately 5 minutes on a full charge.【Specification】Model: Dash CamOn-screen display:3.0" LCD screen.Lens: 170° wide angle.Video resolution: 1080PVideo format: MP4 JPG image format.Video mode: loop recordingLoop recording: integratedParking monitor: integratedG-sensor lock: integratedPower supply: DC 5 V/2 A💾 If the camera prompts you to format the SD card often, please note that:🚗 a. Install the SD card first and then open the dashboard;🚗 b. The SD card must be formatted in the machine (not in the computer);🚗 c. Follow the above and if it still reports an error, try replacing the SD card for testing;📦Package includes✅1× Dashboard camera front✅1× Car charger✅1× Card reader✅1× User manual

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It is not 1080p
reviews.reviewText: The picture is blurry and you can’t see license plate and sometimes you can’t see the video because of all the sun light. If you don’t care for picture quality this is ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great birthday present.
reviews.reviewText: This was bought for my wife's birthday to install in her new car and so far it works great, the video quality is excellent. Easy and convenient to install and can be used at night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the best car recorder I've ever bought, with a large HD screen and a night vision function, it's very clear even at night and can meet the shooting conditions

reviews.reviewText: This dash cam has excellent video quality and can provide clear images under all lighting conditions. Its careful design ensures that my vision is never obstructed, and the user-friendly application makes operation easy.
